title: Furnished/Non furnished 36m2 one bedroom apartment
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Furnished / Non furnished one bedroom apartment in Montmartre 18th arrondissement, Total space 36m2.
Living room
Separate bedroom
Separate kitchen
Bathroom and separate WC.
Hardwood floor.
Chimney.
Ground floor facing interior courtyard.
Safe and quite.
Non furnished: 990 euros per month including building charges and water.
Furnished: 1050 euros per month including building charges and water.

Real-estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).

To schedule a visit, please contact us via WhatsApp on +33663087837 or send us an email.
